titlStmt.titl: Replication data for: Rapid monoterpene induction promotes the susceptibility of a novel host pine to mountain pine beetle colonization but not to beetle-vectored fungi

citation.biblCit: Rapid monoterpene induction promotes the susceptibility of a novel host pine to mountain pine beetle colonization but not to beetle-vectored fungi

otherMat.txt: Reproduction data for experiments investigating effects of monoterpene induction levels on the growth and reproduction of three mountain pine beetle-associated fungi: Grosmannia clavigera, Ophiostoma montium, and Leptographium longiclavatum. See README for descriptions of dataset variables.
Reproduction data for concentrations of monoterpenes induced in response to Grosmannia clavigera inoculations in lodgepole and jack pine trees. See README for description of dataset variables.
